history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07214
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS 20, 22, 27, 28, 34, 40, 50, 220, 237, 237-A, 290, 291, 292 AND ADDING SECTIONS 293, 294, 295, 296, 297, 298, 298-A, 299, 300, 301, 302, 303, 304, 305, AND 306 UNDER CHAPTERS I, II, III, IV, V AND VI, ALL UNDER THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Represents the second package of the Comprehensive Tax Reform Program (CTRP); Complements R.A.No.10963 - Tax Reform for Acceleration and Inclusion (TRAIN) Law; Seeks to lower the corporate income tax rate, reform the corporate income tax system and broaden the tax base by modernizing investment tax incentives.
ALIAS NAME : TRAIN 2
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P., SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-20
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HB08083
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2018-02-26
